segments.text: Last night I looked for my Indian classmate Barbara . I found her sitting with her legs crossed and quietly practicing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Needless to say , it must be Indian Yoga .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary , you say something about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tracing back , Yoga has a very long history . It was originated before India had approved Yoga and these documents were arranged and written according to the contents passed by mouth to mouth . In other words , Yoga is passed down from ancient times , which cannot be recalled .
segments.speaker: S2
